text: @PressSec @DonaldJTrumpJr @Twitter But, @PressSec I understand you have mailed in your vote at least ten times. You are so hypocritical. There is NO evidence that fraud is rampant with mail in votes. This BS shows 1)trump is scared he’ll lose 2) he doesn’t care if people are scared to vote in person during covid19
